ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT: Activation link has been sent to your email. Please check your email to activate your accounts.
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATED_SUCCESS: Congratulations. Your account is activated. You can login now.
ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED: Your account is not activated yet.
FORGOT_PASSWORD: Reset password link is sent your email id
FORGOT_PASSWORD_TOKEN_MISMATCH: Sorry, link is expired or  account is not activated yet.
ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXIST: Account is already exist with Email or Contact number
UNABLE_TO_SEND_EMAIL: Unable to send email. Please contact to administrator.
